' At that time, the ghosts gathered from the four directions like clouds, some ghosts had heads like ox heads with forty ears, in their ears grew iron arrows, red flames rose up to a yojana high, had eighteen horns with mountains on the tips, and dragons on the mountains, holding red-hot iron pellets.

She then saw her own body, with a snake head growing on the left, a fox head on the right, and a dog head in the middle, with nine-colored corpses transforming and growing on the head, like the nine-aspect contemplation.
The nine-aspect contemplation is as follows:
First, the appearance of fresh death:
Or seeing a dead person, the body straight without any consciousness, thinking that my body will also be like this, no different from this, it is called the sign of fresh death.
Second, the sign of bluish-black discoloration:

Seeing a dead person, from one day to seven days, the body bluish-black and swollen, the body I love will also be like this, no different from this, it is called the sign of bluish-black discoloration.
Third, the sign of pus and blood:

Seeing a dead person, the body already rotten and decaying, blood flowing everywhere, extremely disgusting and unviewable, the body I love will also be like this, it is called the sign of pus and blood.
Fourth, the sign of reddish fluid:
Seeing a dead person, the body twisted and contorted, reddish fluid flowing out like cinnabar liquid, the body I love will also be like this, it is called the sign of reddish fluid.
Fifth, the sign of indigestion:

Or seeing a dead body being eaten by crows and birds, gnawed by insects and wolves, and infested by flies, with the flesh almost gone or half the body remaining, one's beloved body will also be like this, thus it is called the sign of undigested food.
Sixth, the sign of sinews binding like firewood:

Or seeing a dead body, with skin and flesh already gone, only sinews and bones connected, like firewood bound together, thus it is formed and does not disperse, one's beloved body will also be like this, thus it is called the sign of sinews binding like firewood.
Seventh, the sign of the separation of bones and joints:

Or seeing a dead body, with sinews already rotten and bones and joints scattered in all directions not in one place, one's beloved body will also be like this, thus it is called the sign of the separation of bones and joints.
Eighth, the sign of burning and loathsomeness:

Or seeing a dead body, burned by the fire of the family, burned by a wild fire, shriveling on the ground, extremely disgusting and unbearable to look at, the body that I love will also be like this, therefore it is said to be the repulsive aspect of burning and shriveling.
Ninth, the aspect of old bones:

Seeing old dry bones, whether fifty years old, up to a hundred years, two hundred years, or three hundred years old, the bones turn white again, exposed to the sun in the middle of the day, fire rises from the bones, flame after flame, after the burning by fire, the wind blows into the ground and returns to the earth.
This is called briefly explaining the nine aspects, this is the bodhisattva first under the tree, first opening the door of contemplation of impurity.
